name: Gimmick Puppet - Replacement
text: Send up to 3 monsters whose combined Level equals 8 from your hand to the Graveyard. Then, add 1 Level 8 "Gimmick Puppet" monster to your hand from your Deck. This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck (excluding Extra Deck) that contains at least 1 monster and no monsters other than DARK Machine-Type monsters. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
